definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: That would cause the greenhouse effect and begin the terra forming.
sentences.chinese: 这会引起温室效应，继而形成土地。

sentences.english: Hence Venus withers under a runaway greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 所以金星在温室效应的影响下会逐渐干枯。

sentences.english: And yes, the same thing could happen with man-made global warming.
sentences.chinese: 当然，同样的情形也可能发生在温室效应上。

sentences.english: Lily: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因为温室效应呗，这些岛屿是属于马尔代夫的。

sentences.english: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因为温室效应呗，这些岛屿是属于马尔代夫的。

sentences.english: However, SF6 will be eliminated due to its high greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 但SF6因其高温室效应，即将被禁用。

sentences.english: The influence of greenhouse effect to agricultural and forest pests was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了温室效应与农林害虫的关系。

sentences.english: If Earth had no greenhouse effect at all, it would be too cold for us altogether.
sentences.chinese: 如果地球上根本没有温室效应，那将会非常之冷。

sentences.english: Its own greenhouse effect would make for more warming.
sentences.chinese: 这样水蒸气的温室效应就会产生更大的影响。

sentences.english: Its the year 2097 and global warming has caused the polar ice caps to melt.
sentences.chinese: 年，全球温室效应已经导致两极的冰无边帽融化。

sentences.english: Switch to energy-efficient light bulbs in your house to reduce the effects of global warming.
sentences.chinese: 为减少地球温室效应，在房内安装节能灯。

sentences.english: Global Temperature Forced by Solar Irradiation and Greenhouse Gases?
sentences.chinese: 咸信温室效应气体是导致全球气温升高的主因。

sentences.english: Many scientists attribute global warming to the greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 许多科学家把地球变暖归诸温室效应。

sentences.english: Scientists slink climate change to the greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 科学家将气候变化归因于温室效应。

sentences.english: It is believed that greenhouse gases are the main causes of global warming .
sentences.chinese: 咸信温室效应气体是导致全球气温升高的主因。

definition: global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3

definition: El Niño effect, equatorial climatic variation over the Pacific Ocean
pinyin: e4 er3 ni2 nuo4 xian4 xiang4
